20101230010543.000|20101230010547.000|CC1|NOW, THIS GUN IS UNLOADED, IT IS

20101230010551.000|20101230010553.000|CC1|>> STEVE, LET ME STOP YOU FOR A 
20101230010553.000|20101230010554.000|CC1|SECOND.

20101230010556.000|20101230010558.000|CC1|YOU CAN WALK US THROUGH IT.     
20101230010558.000|20101230010559.000|CC1|THIS IS WHAT THIS YOUNG MAN

20101230010601.000|20101230010603.000|CC1|ARRESTING CHARGES, FIRST-DEGREE 
20101230010603.000|20101230010603.000|CC1|MURDER.                         
20101230010603.000|20101230010607.000|CC1|HE SAID HE WRAPPED THE SLIDE    
20101230010607.000|20101230010614.000|CC1|BACK, CAUSING THE GUN TO COCK,  
20101230010614.000|20101230010616.000|CC1|AND THEN PLACED THE GUN TO HIS  
20101230010616.000|20101230010618.000|CC1|WIFE'S HEAD, CAUSING IT TO GO   
20101230010618.000|20101230010618.000|CC1|OFF.                            
20101230010618.000|20101230010619.000|CC1|SHOW US THAT.                   
20101230010619.000|20101230010620.000|CC1|THAT HE WRAPPED THE SLIDE BACK, 
20101230010620.000|20101230010621.000|CC1|START AT THE BEGINNING.         
20101230010621.000|20101230010623.000|CC1|>> HERE IS THE WEAPON.          
20101230010623.000|20101230010626.000|CC1|THERE WOULD BE ONE OF TWO WITH  
20101230010626.000|20101230010628.000|CC1|WAYS THAT HE WOULD LIKELY TO DO 
20101230010628.000|20101230010628.000|CC1|IT.                             
20101230010628.000|20101230010630.000|CC1|HE WOULD GRAB THE SLIDE HERE AND
20101230010630.000|20101230010632.000|CC1|RACK IT BACK, THAT WOULD CHAMBER
20101230010632.000|20101230010633.000|CC1|A ROUND.                        
20101230010633.000|20101230010634.000|CC1|THIS IS A DISTINCTLY DIFFERENT  
20101230010634.000|20101230010635.000|CC1|SOUND UNLOADED THAN IT DOES     
20101230010635.000|20101230010636.000|CC1|LOADED.                         
20101230010636.000|20101230010637.000|CC1|THE OTHER WAY HE MAY DO THAT IS 
20101230010637.000|20101230010639.000|CC1|TO COKE THE GUN HERE, PULL THE  
20101230010639.000|20101230010641.000|CC1|SLIDE BACK, AND CHAMBER THE     
20101230010641.000|20101230010641.000|CC1|ROUND.                          
20101230010641.000|20101230010644.000|CC1|NOW, IF THERE WERE A BULLET IN  
20101230010644.000|20101230010645.000|CC1|THERE, THERE WOULD BE A MECHANIC
20101230010645.000|20101230010647.000|CC1|THAT THE SLIDE WOULD DRAG THE   
20101230010647.000|20101230010650.000|CC1|BULLET INTO THAT CHAMBER, INTO  
20101230010650.000|20101230010652.000|CC1|THE BARREL.                     
20101230010652.000|20101230010654.000|CC1|AND IT WOULD FEEL COMPLETELY    
20101230010654.000|20101230010656.000|CC1|DIFFERENT THAN IT DOES UNLOADED.
20101230010656.000|20101230010658.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE SAYING THAT WHEN YOU  
20101230010658.000|20101230010701.000|CC1|RACK THE SLIDE BACK AND COCK    
20101230010701.000|20101230010702.000|CC1|THAT GUN, YOU KNOW RIGHT THEN   
20101230010702.000|20101230010704.000|CC1|AND THERE IF THAT GUN IS LOADED 
20101230010704.000|20101230010706.000|CC1|OR IF IT ISN'T LOADED, BY THE   
20101230010706.000|20101230010706.000|CC1|FEEL?                           
20101230010706.000|20101230010708.000|CC1|>> ANY EXPERT, ANY PERSON THAT  
20101230010708.000|20101230010709.000|CC1|HANDLES GUNS ON A REGULAR BASIS 
20101230010709.000|20101230010711.000|CC1|KNOWS THE FEELING.              
20101230010711.000|20101230010712.000|CC1|IT'S A SIGNIFICANT DIFFERENCE,  
20101230010712.000|20101230010714.000|CC1|IN WEIGHT, WHEN THE GUN IS      
20101230010714.000|20101230010718.000|CC1|LOADED THAN WHEN IT'S NOT       
20101230010718.000|20101230010718.000|CC1|LOADED.                         
20101230010718.000|20101230010720.000|CC1|WHEN YOU CHAMBER THE GUN IN A   
20101230010720.000|20101230010722.000|CC1|LOADED GUN IS A METALLIC SOUND. 
20101230010722.000|20101230010723.000|CC1|THERE'S NO MECHANISM OF ENGAGING
20101230010723.000|20101230010724.000|CC1|THAT BULLET INTO THE BARREL.    
20101230010724.000|20101230010725.000|CC1|IT'S SIGNIFICANTLY DEFERENT.    
20101230010725.000|20101230010727.000|CC1|ANY EXPERT WOULD KNOW THE       
20101230010727.000|20101230010728.000|CC1|DIFFERENCE, IRREGARDLESS OF WHAT
20101230010728.000|20101230010730.000|CC1|HE WAS DOING, HANDLING THAT GUN.
20101230010730.000|20101230010735.000|CC1|>> LET'S GO TO THE LAWYERS.

20101230010800.000|20101230010801.000|CC1|HIS STORY?                      
20101230010801.000|20101230010802.000|CC1|YOU DON'T GO AROUND TELL YOUR   
20101230010802.000|20101230010803.000|CC1|FRIENDS AND FAMILY, THIS IS WHAT

20101230011659.000|20101230011701.000|CC1|OPEN THE SLIDE, AND I WOULD LOCK
20101230011701.000|20101230011703.000|CC1|IT -- I WOULD LOCK IT IN PLACE.
